name: case
description: Allows you to describe alternative flows in queries using if-then-else constructs that work on event streams. Similar to case or cond in functional programming languages.

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: Conditions to evaluate for each branch

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: Actions to perform when condition matches

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: Default case using * for all other events

notes: Can be destructive (modifying existing fields) or non-destructive (creating new fields with _ prefix).
